desc: 3턴 간 수속성 아군 유닛 전원의 공격력 50% 증가

dictionary.lore: A special stone made from a Fate Stone in which the spirit of water obtained from a Water Eye is sealed. It increases the attack power of water users. The Savat people are said to have excelled at synthesizing Water Stones. One of the Six Heroes, Serena, was from that tribe and was famous for her use the stones.

name: 수격석
